testcase.description:
Test search and expect a search result with multiple products.
# 1. Setup and preparation
- Start session, open homepage and delete all visible cookies
# 2. Scope of test
- Search for text - Returns multiple products aka a product listing page - Validate result page (similar to catalog page) - Select a product - Validate product detail page
# 3. Clean up
- End session and clean up created cookies
testcase.codecomment:
## Many Results
- Search product color - Validate results page (similar to catalog page) - Validate search string - Go to random product - Validate PDP - Validate PDP product number
